text: Lía Bermúdez (August 4, 1930 - October 22, 2021) was a Venezuelan sculptor. She was born in Caracas, Venezuela. She was a student of the masters Julio Narváez and Francisco Maragall. Her works were shown in Washington, D.C., New York City, Mexico City, and London.Lía Bermudez, Premio Nacional de Artes Plásticas She was awarded the Order of the Liberator Knighthood, an award from the University of Carabobo. Bermúdez died on October 22, 2021 at the age of 91.Muere la escultora venezolana Lía Bermúdez, a los 91 años de edad ==References== ==Other websites== * Lia Bermudez foundation Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sculptors Category:People from Caracas
title: Lía Bermúdez
